message: I'm just so glad the pain from "webfonts all the things" is about to get a little bit less https://plus.google.com/u/0/photos/+IlyaGrigorik/albums/5986633125826401921/5986633130457213586?pid=5986633130457213586&oid=114552443805676710515
name: Ilya Grigorik's photo on Google+
caption: plus.google.com
description: Fresh off the press... Chrome will make text visible after 3s (i.e. slow font download), and rerender once it's ready: http://bit.ly/1luUIst - this is the same behavior as Firefox. If you're wondering why 3s, see our stats here: http://www.igvita.com/2014/01/31/optimizing-web-font-rendering-...
